question: 16 Production Linked Incentive (PLI) projects related to which sector, have been approved by the Government?
explanation:
The Government has approved 16 Production Linked Incentive (PLI) projects related to the Electronics sector.
As per the statement issued by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, this approval will fetch Rs 11,000-crore additional investments in local electronics manufacturing. It includes five proposals from Indian manufacturers including Micromax and Lava.
